text: Verónica Escobar Romo (born 15 December 1955) is a Mexican lawyer and politician from the Institutional Revolutionary Party. In 2012 she served as Mayor of Acapulco succeeding Manuel Añorve Baños. ==See also== * List of mayors of Acapulco (municipality) ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Mexico City Category:Institutional Revolutionary Party politicians Category:Mayors of places in Mexico
title: Verónica Escobar Romo
